name: bj-denotesv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0
body: |- wb(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))

stmt.origin: cbvexvw(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
stmt.pretty: cbvexvw(s0, s1, s0 = c0, s1 = c0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0))
-| diffsw(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))

|- wb(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))

-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, wceq(cv(s1), c0))
-| diffsw(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))

-| diffsw(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))

-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wb(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))

comment: Version of ~ bj-denotes with the additional condition DV(x,y). With that additional disjoint variable condition, a short proof is possible, which depends only on ~ ax-1 through ~ ax-7 and ~ eqeq1 . The latter is an axiom in free logic but in our axiomatization its proof requires ~ ax-ext and ~ df-cleq (hence ~ ax-9 ). Compared to ~ bj-denotes , it does not require ~ ax-12 nor ~ df-clab nor ~ df-clel (nor ~ ax-8 ). (Contributed by BJ, 29-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
